column1: Table 73. Percent distribution of victimizations in which self-protective measures taken by the victim were helpful
data source: National Criminal Victimization Survey, 2005  NCJ 215244
authors:  Patsy Klaus and Cathy Maston
Table 73. Personal crimes of violence, 2005: Percent distribution of victimizations in which self-protective measures taken by the victim were helpful
Note: Detail may not add to total shown because of rounding.
Excludes victimizations in which no self-protective actions were taken.
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/Includes verbal threats of rape and threats of sexual assault.
